data.title: Top 100 Handsome Indian Men
data.meta_description: Top 100 Handsome Men, Top 100 Handsome Indian Men, Prashanth
data.text: An actor who wanted to be a doctor initially, Prashanth, is the son of South Indian actor - producer - director, T. Thiagarajan. He debuted with the Tamil movie 'Vaigasi Poranthachu' (1990) at a young age of 17, which fared fairly well at the box office. 'Chembaruthi' (1992) directed by Selvamani gave him a strong footing in Tamil movies. Apart from Tamil, Prashanth also has many successful films to his credit in Malayalam, Telugu and Hindi. 'Thiruda Thiruda' (1993), 'Jeans'(1998) (Tamil), 'Perunthachan' (Malayalam), 'Tholi Muddu' (1993), 'Prema Vijayam', 'Premapattam', 'Allariprema' (Telugu), 'I Love You' (Hindi) are some of the films which showcases his talent. Prashanth who has the nickname 'Kathal Ilavarasan' (the Prince of Love) has received the Kalaimamani award from Government of Tamilnadu and is a Bharathanatyam exponent. He also plays many musical instruments and has passed third grade in Piano music from Trinity College of Music, London. Adventurous by nature he is trained in martial arts, gymnastics, roller skating, horse riding, rowing and yachting. He got married in 2005, to Grihalakshmi.
